column6: Used to maintain your Operations Level, Building, Territory, Research, Orion Syndicate and Fleet Commander bonuses.
column15: Maintain a record of your officer's ATA Trait levels. View details about all the ATA missions, and which officers have matching traits for them.

column6: Used to maintain a record of your officer's ranks and levels and view officer abilities, notes and upgrade scores. Also has the main, single ship, loadout planner, and Exocomp selection.

column15: Allows you to analyse different aspects of the ATA system. List ATA missions by Officer or required reward. You can also list officers by their traits.

column6: Allows you to plan multiple ship loadouts for all your docks.
column15: Keep track of the ATA's you would like to concentrate on. Select the Officer whos traits you want to upgrade, and to which level. See the impact the upgrades will produce.

column6: Use the filters to assist to identify crew suggestions for different scenarios
Maintain a record of your ship levels (optional), or simply use this sheet to view ship statistics and firing patterns.
column15: Use this screen to migrate your data to a new version.
List of changes by version number.

column10: Join us on the official Discord Channel

column4: If you find this tool useful, and use it regularly. Please consider making a donation towards the time taken developing it, and future updates, it would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.
